resources.string:
Pantry - You can add anything you have on hand to your pantry to better keep track of all your food and supplies. 

Grocery List- This is a wonderful place to store everything you're going to need, the add button can make sure you keep track of what you need on your way to the store. As well as having the ability to remove items you feel you dont need anymore! 

Recipe List- This is a list of recipes that you can try out as well as making sure you pantry items are conveniently on hand.


Application Credits:
Developers:
Justin Smith
De'Angelo Rieke

Ingredients required: 
Blocked white cheddar cheese
Sliced munster cheese
Sliced bread of choice
Butter or butter substitute of choice
 Utensils required: 
Skillet
Heat resistant flipper
Spreading knife
Cheese slicer(Wire or otherwise)
Basic kitchen knife

Use your cheese slicer to cut generous slices off your block of white cheddar\nSet these to the side for now, grab two slices of bread and butter one side generously on each\n When you have everything prepared move on to the next step!

Now place your skillet over a medium heat
Place the bread butter side down into the skillet placing 2 slices of cheddar on one piece of bread and 2 slices of munster on the other
 wait until you can see the cheese start to glisten and melt. Use your flipper to place the two pieces of bread together
Continue cooking each side evenly flipping the sandwich frequently until golden brown
 Slice and enjoy!
